parameters.content:
# Overview
This workflow aggregates affiliate marketing data from multiple networks:
- Commission Junction (CJ): https://developers.cj.com/docs/rest-apis/link-search
- Impact Radius (IR): https://developer.impact.com/
- Awin: https://wiki.awin.com/index.php/API_Authentication

The workflow standardizes data formats across networks, enabling unified processing and comparison of affiliate offers from diverse sources to support multiple brand websites.

## Credentials
- CJ Bearer Auth token (credential name: "CJ Bearer Auth n8n-SHOP-cj-20250717")
- HTTP Bearer Authentication for accessing the CJ Link Search API
- Personal Access Token for CJ's API (referenced but implementation details hidden)
- Additional credentials may be needed for destination systems where processed data is sent

## Robustness improvements:
- Implement network-specific error handling for each API
- Add circuit breakers to prevent cascade failures when one network is down
- Create separate logging for each network's API calls
- Implement staggered/queued requests to manage rate limits across all networks
- Add data validation for each network's specific response format
- Create fallback mechanisms when certain networks are unavailable
- Add monitoring dashboards to track performance across networks
- Implement network-specific retry policies based on their API behavior
- Develop a health check system to verify all network connections
- Consider a caching layer for frequently accessed campaign data

parameters.columns: SourceNetwork, AdvertiserID, AdvertiserName, CampaignID, ContractStatus, RegionsCountries, Terms, TrackingURL, CREATED_TS, UPDATED_TS
